isSplashButtonBottom.name: Splash screen button at the bottom
isSplashButtonBottom.description: If true, the button will be at the bottom of the screen, otherwise it will be at the top

videoOnSplash.name: Video on splash screen
videoOnSplash.description: If true, the splash screen will have a video, otherwise it will have an image carusel

isSidebarLeft.name: Sidebar on the left
isSidebarLeft.description: If true, the sidebar will be on the left, otherwise it will be on the right

home.name: Home
home.description: If true, the home button will be visible

offers.name: Offers
offers.description: If true, the offers button will be visible

groupedByCategory.name: Grouped by category
groupedByCategory.description: If true, the items will be grouped by category, otherwise they will be displayed in a list

callToActionTop.name: Call to action at the top
callToActionTop.description: If true, the call to action will be at the top of the screen, otherwise it will be at the bottom

areSameItemsGrouped.name: Same items grouped
areSameItemsGrouped.description: If true, the same items will be grouped, otherwise they will be displayed separately

badgeForOneElement.name: Badge for one element
badgeForOneElement.description: If true, the badge will be displayed for one element, otherwise it will be displayed for more than one element

isDarkMode.name: Dark mode
isDarkMode.description: If true, the app will be in dark mode, otherwise it will be in light mode
